sqlMap.statement: SELECT AR.ARC_RQST_PK AS ARC_RQST_PK FROM ARC_RQST AR ,ARC_TBL AT WHERE AR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND AR.ARC_CPLT_TS IS NULL AND AR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND AR.SRC_SCHM_NM = AT.SRC_SCHM_NM AND AR.SRC_TBL_NM = AT.SRC_TBL_NM AND AR.EZCANCELFLAG = AT.EZCANCELFLAG AND AT.SRC_TBL_OWNR_NM = #srcTblOwnrNm# AND AT.ARC_PROC_GRP_ID = #arcProcGrpId# ORDER BY AR.EZINTIME ASC, AR.ARC_RQST_PK ASC
